<h3 id="X34611">X(34611) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC TO MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^3-2*(b+c)*a^2+(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34611) = X(8)-4*X(15171) = X(145)+2*X(6284) = 4*X(950)-X(14923) = 3*X(3058)-X(34612) = X(3869)-4*X(10624) = X(3885)+2*X(10572) = X(11114)-4*X(34649) = X(11114)+2*X(34719) = X(34629)+2*X(34745) = 2*X(34649)+X(34719)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34612)</p>
<p>X(34611) lies on these lines:
{1,11015}, {2,11}, {4,11239}, {8,11113}, {21,4309}, {30,944}, {56,20066}, {145,529}, {333,21283}, {376,10806}, {516,3873}, {517,5890}, {519,3869}, {527,30628}, {754,34683}, {902,33141}, {950,14923}, {1058,5253}, {1279,33131}, {1479,3871}, {1697,5086}, {1770,3889}, {1836,3957}, {2177,33106}, {2475,3303}, {2476,3746}, {2975,4294}, {3052,33142}, {3120,17715}, {3175,4463}, {3219,4863}, {3242,33100}, {3244,34690}, {3295,17532}, {3543,12667}, {3583,25439}, {3586,3895}, {3616,15172}, {3621,34689}, {3623,7354}, {3635,10483}, {3655,12700}, {3679,5178}, {3681,5853}, {3685,5014}, {3689,27131}, {3722,3944}, {3744,33134}, {3748,31019}, {3749,33133}, {3750,33104}, {3813,4189}, {3839,10894}, {3870,5057}, {3886,33075}, {3890,12575}, {3913,5046}, {3935,24703}, {3938,33095}, {3979,24725}, {4030,4671}, {4193,4857}, {4330,8666}, {4387,33091}, {4430,17768}, {4432,33117}, {4450,10453}, {4514,32929}, {4660,32943}, {4689,29680}, {4693,32854}, {4702,32858}, {4854,29815}, {5080,9668}, {5082,5260}, {5225,10528}, {5249,30331}, {5303,10529}, {5441,22837}, {5536,31146}, {5603,28452}, {5658,9812}, {5695,33090}, {5840,7967}, {5880,29817}, {6261,31162}, {7504,31452}, {8616,33136}, {9352,11019}, {9589,11520}, {9669,27529}, {9709,26127}, {9710,16859}, {10056,17577}, {10072,13587}, {10129,13405}, {10269,13199}, {10284,12672}, {10386,24390}, {10543,13463}, {10724,12115}, {10914,31795}, {11112,15170}, {11237,34706}, {11355,19738}, {11451,22278}, {11691,31770}, {12513,15680}, {12649,34744}, {12701,34647}, {12953,20060}, {15310,23155}, {16371,34707}, {17155,17764}, {17220,17378}, {17233,28599}, {17597,33102}, {17765,32925}, {17766,32915}, {18134,21282}, {18990,20057}, {19538,31494}, {20070,34618}, {24473,28198}, {28610,30332}, {29818,33149}, {29844,32845}, {31145,34606}, {32782,32941}</p>
<p>
X(34611) = midpoint of X(6284) and X(34699)<br>
X(34611) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 3058), (8, 11113), (145, 34699), (3621, 34689), (10483, 34637), (11112, 15170), (11113, 15171), (17579, 1), (20070, 34618), (31145, 34606), (34605, 3241), (34617, 1482), (34637, 3635), (34690, 3244), (34698, 1483)<br>
X(34611) = anticomplement of X(34612)<br>
X(34611) = pole of the line {518, 11681} wrt Feuerbach hyperbola<br>
X(34611) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 33094, 33146), (2, 149, 11235), (2, 11235, 11680), (2, 20075, 34607), (2, 34607, 100), (55, 149, 11680), (55, 11235, 2), (390, 3434, 1621), (497, 20075, 100), (497, 34607, 2), (1621, 3434, 33108), (3829, 4995, 2), (4421, 11238, 2), (4428, 31140, 2)<br>
</p>
